TextView.android:text:
In layman's terms, a 'Libretro core' is something you use to either:

a) Play games meant for a specific 'simulated' system (i.e. an emulator)

b) Play games meant for a specific game engine (ie. Doom [Prboom], Cave Story [NXEngine]).

Libretro cores will not play any games by themselves - just like how a games console needs a DVD or a cartridge to play a game, so too does a Libretro core either need 'ROM files' or a 'CD ISO' image in order to play games with it.
